metadata.name: LOVELY
metadata.description: As a token of appreciation this neo-classical luxury surrealistic artwork was created to embed feelings of harmony, abundance and worthiness of wealth elevation through increased self-concept within the owners of this piece. The rising cloud mist helps the viewer to shift into feeling as though they have ascended into higher levels of themselves. The soundscape softly plays rich musical tones in 528 hz Solfeggio sound frequency, the frequency coined as the "Miracle Tone" often used for healing and repairing DNA at the cellular level and quantum experiences.
